sentences.cn: 关于超自然现象的纪录片

sentences.en: a spiritual healer with psychic powers
sentences.cn: 有超自然力量的精神治疗师

sentences.en: But the " fateful " garlic proved to be not so psychic after all.
sentences.cn: 然而那 “ 命运 ” 的大蒜头这次竟不灵验.

sentences.en: He declared his total disbelief in psychic phenomena.
sentences.cn: 他宣称自己完全不相信鬼魂现象。

sentences.en: I believe everyone is innately psychic.
sentences.cn: 我相信每个人天生都有超自然的能力。

sentences.en: If she had been at all psychic she must have felt something.
sentences.cn: 倘使她是那种有心灵感应的人,她一定有所感触.

sentences.en: It's slow and yet searing psychic force!
sentences.cn: 这是慢性地摧裂心肺的力量 啊 !

sentences.en: Parapsychology is a knowlege studying on various human psychic phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 超心理学是研究心理学领域以外,各种心灵现象的一种学问.

sentences.en: Pretty soon when you dial 911 around here, you're going to get the Psychic Friends Network.
sentences.cn: 不久你们在这周围打911, 就会连上通灵助手网了.

sentences.en: Psychic changes have been commonly observed, as well as daytime somnolence, nocturnal insomnia, and partial blindness.
sentences.cn: 普遍观察的有精神变化, 以及白天嗜睡, 夜间失眠和部分失明.

sentences.en: She claims to be psychic and helps people to contact the dead.
sentences.cn: 她自称有通灵术，能帮助活人与死者沟通。

sentences.en: Some people are said to have psychic powers.
sentences.cn: 据说有些人有通灵的能力.

sentences.en: The psychic pain is so great that many victims would rather have terminal cancer.
sentences.cn: 由于精神上的巨大痛苦,许多患者都宁愿得晚期癌症.

sentences.en: These truths cause individuals much psychic pain.
sentences.cn: 这些真相给个体带来巨大的精神痛苦。

sentences.en: Thought Bastion: This shield protects the wielder as the Psychic Bastion feat.
sentences.cn: 思维堡垒: 该盾牌如同“心力堡垒”专长那样保护持用者.

sentences.en: Trevor helped police by using his psychic powers.
sentences.cn: 特雷弗用他的通灵能力帮助了警方。

sentences.en: Violet: Psychic damage and the target is dominated ( save ends ).
sentences.cn: 紫: 心灵伤害,目标被控制 ( 豁免终止 ).

words.tran_cn: 精神病学的；精神病治疗的
精神病治疗的；精神病学的
影响心理状态的；作用于精神的
精神分析的；心理分析的
精神病学家，精神病医生
精神病学；精神病治疗法
心理分析，精神分析；精神病患者
精神分析学家；心理分析学家
[心理] 心理发生；精神发生
用精神分析疗法治疗分析
精神的；心灵的；灵魂的；超自然的

trans.tran_cn: 精神的，超自然的，灵魂的，心灵的
trans.tran_en: affecting the mind rather than the body

trans.tran_cn: 通灵的或有特异功能的人，巫师
